talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$General Douglas$
The courageous soldiers of Saint Haven are currently trying their best to fight off the monsters of the Dark Mines.
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$General Douglas$
I have too much work to do now. If there is no urgent matter, please find later okie?
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Ignacio looks at you with miserable eyes.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
We have no choice but to target the Dark Overlord Keep to find the Prophet.
But then... There are no troops that are readily available for dispatch...

$Bishop Ignacio$
For now, I guess the best thing would be to make use of the Royal Castle's Elite Soldiers.

$General Douglas$
The courageous soldiers of Saint Haven are currently trying their best to fight off the monsters of the Dark Mines.
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$General Douglas$
I have just returned.
I have too much work to do now. If there is no urgent matter, please find later okie?
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Bishop Ignacio${action:talk}
The Elite Soldiers are currently gathered near the Dark Mines with General Douglas.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then I will go to the Dark Mines.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
They are facing the monsters of the Dark Mines.
Situation over there is not as urgent as the situation of the Prophet. So go to General Douglas, and tell him about the situation over here.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Will you do that? Then hurry up and tell General Douglas about our urgent situation, and tell him to send the troops back to the Royal Castle. Here, I will write a personal letter to inform them about the situation over here.

$Bishop Ignacio${action:talk}
Take this letter to General Douglas at Dark Mines.
He is a loyal man, so he will understand the crisis of this nation.

$Bishop Ignacio${action:talk}
Take this letter to General Douglas at Dark Mines.
He is a loyal man, so he will understand the crisis of this nation.

$General Douglas${action:talk}
Hmm? Who are you?
You seem like a normal adventurer. This is a dangerous place, so return.

$General Douglas$
I think I have never heard that name before... What are you here for?
As you can see, I am in the middle of an important operation.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The general folded up the letter he has finished reading.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas$
Hmm? The Bishop's letter? Here, let me take a look.
(He hastily reads the letter.)
... Hmm. So there was a crisis while I was absent.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The General pats you on the shoulders.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas$
The Dark Mines is a very important position for supply of logistic for war. it would be a terrible situation if the monsters were to take over it. But since saving the Prophet is also an urgent matter, the Adventurer's Guild should temporarily defend this area.

$General Douglas$
It's a shame that Bomb Expert Numharoko, who took over the mines, got away before our eyes, but we'll just have to hope for the next opportunity...
So we can now send the troops back. I will gather the troops around the mines and return with them.

$General Douglas${action:talk}
Well then, I will see you at the Royal Castle.

$General Douglas$
The defense of this place will be left to the Adventurer's Guild, and our troops will be sent back.
I will be returning to the Royal Castle soon, so you should start leaving as well. I will see you at the Royal Castle.

$Bishop Ignacio$
General Douglas has just returned.
Now hurry up and discuss with him about the operations to be used for the attack on the Black Knight's base.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>We must hurry to the Dark Overlord Keep.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas${action:talk}
I have just returned.
I see that you have returned safely as well.

$General Douglas$
Oh, do not hurry. There are still soldiers who have not yet returned, and many of the troops are exhausted from the long fights against the monsters at Dark Mines.

$General Douglas$
As soon as the troops have been re-organized, they will be dispatched to the DarK Overlord Keep, so don't worry.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Plans to Assemble the Elite Soldiers
journal.contents:
Talk to Bishop Ignacio about using the Elite Soldiers.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio

journal.title: To General Douglas
journal.contents:
Bishop Ignacio was trying to assemble the Elite Soldiers, but they are currently at the Dark Mines with General Douglas. Go to the Dark Mines and look for General Douglas.

Hermalte Port (Dark Mines Access) → Dark Mines
journal.destination: Talk to General Douglas at Dark Mines
journal.todo_msg: Meet General Douglas at Dark Mines and request troop support.

journal.title: Returning to Royal Castle
journal.contents:
General Douglas has promised to withdraw the troops. Return to Royal Castle and talk to General Douglas, who has returned, and then request troop support.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → General Douglas
journal.destination: Talk to General Douglas at Saint Haven Royal Castle
journal.todo_msg: Talk to General Douglas at Saint Haven Royal Castle.
